House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02674
FULL TITLE : AN ACT STRENGTHENING THE PHILIPPINE COMPREHENSIVE POLICY ON HIV-AIDS PREVENTION, TREATMENT, CARE AND SUPPORT, REPEALING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8504, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS 'THE PHILIPPINE AIDS PREVENTION AND CONTROL ACT OF 1998', AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
